[RoadOneWayRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;
;New RTL Initialization
;Added by Tarkus 09/18/2012
;Updated 02/27/2013
;+-Intersection
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x00000000,0x5F020700,0,0

;T-Intersection
TYPE1=0x02020200,0x00000000,0x5F005700,0,0
TYPE2=0x02020002,0x00000000,0x5F005700,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000202,0x00000000,0x5F005700,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020202,0x00000000,0x5F005700,3,0
;
;piece 7
;
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x01000003,0x09700700,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x00000301,0x09700700,1,0

TYPE4=0x00030100,0x03010000,0x09700700,3,0

;
;diagonal one-way road t, straight road
;removing this because we don't have blends between types
;1=0X00020002,0X00000300,0x09006300,0,0
;2=0X02000200,0X00030000,0x09006300,1,0
;3=0X00020002,0X03000000,0x09006300,1,1
;4=0X02000200,0X00000003,0x09006300,3,0
;5=0X00020002,0X00000100,0x09006300,0,1
;6=0X02000200,0X00000001,0x09006300,1,1
;7=0X00020002,0X01000000,0x09006300,2,1
;8=0X02000200,0X00010000,0x09006300,3,1
;
;
;Added 111304 ~ Tropod
;Diagonal Road, Diagonal OneWayRoad transition.
TYPE1=0x03000000,0x00010000,0x5F045A00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000003,0x01000000,0x5F045A00,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000300,0x00000001,0x5F045A00,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030000,0x00000100,0x5F045A00,3,0
TYPE5=0x01000000,0x00000003,0x5F045A00,0,1
TYPE6=0x00010000,0x03000000,0x5F045A00,1,1
TYPE7=0x00000100,0x00030000,0x5F045A00,2,1
TYPE8=0x00000001,0x00000300,0x5F045A00,3,1
; Orthogonal Road, Orthogonal OneWayRoad transition
;Added by Qurlix
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00000200,0x5F045B00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x00020000,0x5F045B00,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x02000000,0x5F045B00,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000002,0x5F045B00,3,0
;Added 121104 ~ Tropod
;Double Diagonal OneWayRoad transition into Straight Road
TYPE1=0x00000200,0x03000001,0x5F04BE00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000200,0x01030000,0x5F04BE00,0,1
TYPE3=0x00020000,0x00000103,0x5F04BE00,1,0
TYPE4=0x00000002,0x00010300,0x5F04BE00,1,1
TYPE5=0x02000000,0x00010300,0x5F04BE00,2,0
TYPE6=0x02000000,0x00000103,0x5F04BE00,2,1
TYPE7=0x00000002,0x01030000,0x5F04BE00,3,0
TYPE8=0x00020000,0x03000001,0x5F04BE00,3,1

;Added 072204 ~ Tropod
;Double Diagonal Road, Straight onewayroad
;TYPE1=0x01030103,0x02000200,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE2=0x03010301,0x00020002,0x12345678,1,0
;TYPE3=0x03010301,0x02000200,0x12345678,0,1
;TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020002,0x12345678,1,1
;straight road, Double Diagonal onewayroad
;piece 60
;TYPE1=0x00020002,0x03010301,0x12345678,1,1
;TYPE2=0x02000200,0x01030103,0x12345678,2,1
;TYPE3=0x00020002,0x01030103,0x12345678,3,0
;TYPE4=0x02000200,0x03010301,0x12345678,0,0
;diagonal road, Double Diagonal onewayroad 
;piece 238
;TYPE1=0x01000003,0x03010301,0x12345678,1,0
;TYPE2=0x00000301,0x01030103,0x12345678,2,0
;TYPE3=0x00030100,0x03010301,0x12345678,3,0
;TYPE4=0x03010000,0x01030103,0x12345678,0,0
;diagonal road, Double Diagonal onewayroad 
;piece 239
;TYPE1=0x03010000,0x00000103,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE2=0x01000003,0x00010300,0x12345678,1,0
;TYPE3=0x00000301,0x01030000,0x12345678,2,0
;TYPE4=0x00030100,0x03000001,0x12345678,3,0
;
;--NWM OWR +1-Starter--
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
TYPE1=0x00010100,0x02000200,0x511ff300,2,0
TYPE2=0x01010000,0x00020002,0x511ff300,3,0
TYPE3=0x01000001,0x02000200,0x511ff300,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020002,0x511ff300,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM OWR+1
TYPE1=0x00010100,0x02000000,0x511ff300,2,0
TYPE2=0x01010000,0x00000002,0x511ff300,3,0
TYPE3=0x01000001,0x00000200,0x511ff300,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020000,0x511ff300,1,0
;
;--NWM OWR-5-Starter--
;was formerly NWM OWR +2-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;modified 09102016 to produce more stable mod
TYPE1=0x00030300,0x02000200,0x51120000,2,0
TYPE2=0x03030000,0x00020002,0x51120000,3,0
TYPE3=0x03000003,0x02000200,0x51120000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000303,0x00020002,0x51120000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM OWR+2
TYPE1=0x00030300,0x02000000,0x51120000,2,0
TYPE2=0x03030000,0x00000002,0x51120000,3,0
TYPE3=0x03000003,0x00000200,0x51120000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000303,0x00020000,0x51120000,1,0
;
;--NWM OWR +3-Starter--
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
TYPE1=0x00010300,0x02000200,0x511ff500,2,0
TYPE2=0x01030000,0x00020002,0x511ff500,3,0
TYPE3=0x03000001,0x02000200,0x511ff500,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000103,0x00020002,0x511ff500,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM OWR+3
TYPE1=0x00010300,0x02000000,0x511ff500,2,0
TYPE2=0x01030000,0x00000002,0x511ff500,3,0
TYPE3=0x03000001,0x00000200,0x511ff500,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000103,0x00020000,0x511ff500,1,0
;
;--draggable Diagonal AVE-2--
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020000,0x51010200,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x02000002,0x51010200,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x00000202,0x51010200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00020200,0x51010200,3,0
;duplicates disabled ~ memo
;TYPE5=0x01000003,0x02000002,0x51010200,0,1
;TYPE6=0x00000301,0x00000202,0x51010200,3,1
;TYPE7=0x00030100,0x00020200,0x51010200,2,1
;TYPE8=0x03010000,0x02020000,0x51010200,1,1
;
;--NWM TLA-7/AVE-6 Outer-Starter--
;was formerly NWM Road +1-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;modified 09102016 to produce more stable mod
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010100,0x51200000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01010000,0x51200000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000001,0x51200000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000101,0x51200000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM RD-4
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00010100,0x51200000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01010000,0x51200000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x01000001,0x51200000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000101,0x51200000,1,0
;
;--NWM TLA-5-Starter--
;was formerly NWM Road +2-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;modified 09102016 to produce more stable mod
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00030300,0x51100000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x03030000,0x51100000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000003,0x51100000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000303,0x51100000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM TLA-5
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00030300,0x51100000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x03030000,0x51100000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x03000003,0x51100000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000303,0x51100000,1,0
;
;--NWM RD-6-Starter--
;was formerly NWM Road +3-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;modified 09102016 to produce more stable mod and to eliminate Bulldoze Fix conflict
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010303,0x51140000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01030300,0x51140000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03030001,0x51140000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x03000103,0x51140000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM RD-6
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00010303,0x51140000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01030300,0x51140000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x03030001,0x51140000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x03000103,0x51140000,1,0

;Road-HT Top
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000400,0x5C060200,0,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00040000,0x5C060200,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000000,0x5C060200,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000004,0x5C060200,3,0

;Road-HT Bottom
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00040404,0x5C060230,0,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04040400,0x5C060230,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000404,0x5C060230,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04040004,0x5C060230,3,0
;
;Legacy RD-6 Starter Bits
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010300,0x511ff200,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01030000,0x511ff200,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000001,0x511ff200,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000103,0x511ff200,1,0

;New OWR Signalization Dummies
;Ortho Tile
TYPE1=0x00000000,0x02000200,0x5F941000,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000000,0x00020002,0x5F941000,1,0
;Orth Stub into Orth Tile
TYPE1=0x00000000,0x02000000,0x5F941000,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000000,0x00000002,0x5F941000,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000000,0x00000200,0x5F941000,2,0
TYPE4=0x00000000,0x00020000,0x5F941000,3,0
;+-INT
TYPE1=0x00000000,0x02020202,0x09020700,0,0
;+-INT FLEX
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x02020202,0x5F941100,0,0
;New version
TYPE1=0x02020000,0x00000000,0x5F940F00,0,0
TYPE2=0x02000002,0x00000000,0x5F940F00,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000202,0x00000000,0x5F940F00,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020200,0x00000000,0x5F940F00,3,0

;Test for NRD-4 
;TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000000,0x51050000,0,0
;TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00000000,0x51050000,1,0

;--NWM TLA-7/AVE-6 Outer-Starter--
;was formerly NWM Road +2-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;modified 09102016 to produce more stable mod
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00030400,0x51200000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x03040000,0x51200000,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000003,0x51200000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000304,0x51200000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM TLA-7
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00030400,0x51200000,2,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x03040000,0x51200000,3,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x04000003,0x51200000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000304,0x51200000,1,0

;--NWM TLA-9/AVE-8 Outer-Starter--
;was formerly NWM Road +2-Starter
;Added by Tarkus 04012009
;converted to OWR-base for capacity reasons 20170212
TYPE1=0x00010400,0x02000200,0x51210000,2,0
TYPE2=0x01040000,0x00020002,0x51210000,3,0
TYPE3=0x04000001,0x02000200,0x51210000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000104,0x00020002,0x51210000,1,0
;smoncrie Bulldoze Fix for NWM TLA-9
TYPE1=0x00010400,0x02000000,0x51210000,2,0
TYPE2=0x01040000,0x00000002,0x51210000,3,0
TYPE3=0x04000001,0x00000200,0x51210000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000104,0x00020000,0x51210000,1,0

;added by Tarkus 20160911
;TLA7-to-TL starter
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000104,0x5B264080,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00010400,0x5B264080,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01040000,0x5B264080,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04000001,0x5B264080,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000304,0x5B264080,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030400,0x5B264080,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03040000,0x5B264080,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04000003,0x5B264080,1,1

;AVE6-to-TL starter
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000304,0x5B264180,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030400,0x5B264180,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03040000,0x5B264180,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04000003,0x5B264180,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000104,0x5B264180,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00010400,0x5B264180,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01040000,0x5B264180,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04000001,0x5B264180,1,1

;TL-to-TL transition
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01040104,0x5B264280,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010401,0x5B264280,3,0
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03040304,0x5B264280,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04030403,0x5B264280,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03040304,0x5B264280,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04030403,0x5B264280,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01040104,0x5B264280,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010401,0x5B264280,1,1

;Slip Lane
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00020000,0x5B2A0000,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000002,0x02000000,0x5B2A0000,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x00000002,0x5B2A0000,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00000200,0x5B2A0000,3,0
TYPE5=0x00020000,0x02000000,0x5B2A0080,1,1
TYPE6=0x02000000,0x00000002,0x5B2A0080,0,1
TYPE7=0x00000002,0x00000200,0x5B2A0080,3,1
TYPE8=0x00000200,0x00020000,0x5B2A0080,2,1

;FLEXFLUPs Overcrossing-One-Way Road
TYPE1=0x04030403,0x02040204,0x06701200,1,0
TYPE2=0x03040304,0x04020402,0x06701200,0,0
